posts.text:
#Trump is dumb.
With the #TrumpTariffs he is punishing Americans more than the exporting nations. US consumers pay the price increases.
By interfering with investment he displaces local with foreign owners giving them more control of the US economy.
No greatness.

Amid threats from #Trump Admin of secondary sanctions, #India defends purchases of oil from #Russia

Says purchases began only after regular suppliers redirected their oil to Europe - US “actively encouraged” India imports of Russia oil “for strengthening global energy markets' stability"
